DzRenderSettings Class Reference
[Rendering Classes]

Pairs an instance of a DzRenderer with an instance of a DzRenderOptions object. More...

Public Functions

 DzRenderSettings (DzRenderer *r, const DzRenderOptions *options)
 ~DzRenderSettings ()

Detailed Description

Pairs an instance of a DzRenderer with an instance of a DzRenderOptions object.

While pairing a renderer with render options, DzRenderSettings can also contains some of its own settings used during rendering.
